mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ACCT_LOG t where t.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ACCT_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERCODE, USERNAME, YWCODE, YWNAME, TRANCODE, TRANNAME, TRANSTATUS, TRANAMT, TRANPOINT, TRANTIME, TRANDESC, BALAMT, BALPOINT, REMARKS, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME ) VALUES( #{info.id:VARCHAR}, #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, #{info.userCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.userName:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranDesc:VARCHAR}, #{info.balAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.balPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO TB_ACCT_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERCODE, USERNAME, YWCODE, YWNAME, TRANCODE, TRANNAME, TRANSTATUS, TRANAMT, TRANPOINT, TRANTIME, TRANDESC, BALAMT, BALPOINT, REMARKS, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME ) VALUES
( #{info.id:VARCHAR}, #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, #{info.userCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.userName:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranName:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranDesc:VARCHAR}, #{info.balAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.balPoint:NUMERIC}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ACCT_LOG SET USERID = #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, USERCODE = #{info.userCode:VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{info.userName:VARCHAR}, YWCODE = #{info.ywCode:VARCHAR}, YWNAME = #{info.ywName:VARCHAR}, TRANCODE = #{info.tranCode:VARCHAR}, TRANNAME = #{info.tranName:VARCHAR}, TRANSTATUS = #{info.tranStatus:NUMERIC}, TRANAMT = #{info.tranAmt:VARCHAR}, TRANPOINT = #{info.tranPoint:NUMERIC}, TRANTIME = #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, TRANDESC = #{info.tranDesc:VARCHAR}, BALAMT = #{info.balAmt:VARCHAR}, BALPOINT = #{info.balPoint:NUMERIC}, REMARKS = #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{info.id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_ACCT_LOG t WHERE t.ID=#{id}

DELETE FROM TB_ACCT_LOG WHERE ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_ACCT_LOG t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.USERCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.YWNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANDESC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
